revised_title: A Discussion on the Physics and Chemistry of Surfaces: Anniversary Address by Sir Alan Hodgkin
tldr: In this address, Sir Alan Hodgkin discusses the advancements in the physics and chemistry of surfaces, highlighting the contributions of notable scientists such as Nevill Mott, B. J. Mason, Derek Barton, F. H. C. Crick, W. B. Lewis, and A. J. Birch. The address covers various topics, including the properties of matter, the behavior of amorphous materials, and the understanding of genetic information in living cells.
